sources.title: Follow Me Quietly 1949 202505
sources.description: For six months, a strangler calling himself "The Judge" has terrorized the city. He's a self-appointed destroyer of "evil" who only strikes on rainy nights. Police Lieut. Harry Grant is obsessed with catching him but has failed so far, despite various clues. And now Harry is further hampered by attractive tabloid reporter Ann Gorman dogging his footsteps.
